chunk_text: Remaining tour balances will be collected in person on the day of the tour. Acceptable payment options include the credit card on file, a different credit card, or cash. #### What is your Cancellation policy? Please select "Book Now", and someone from our team will reply within 48 hours. West Hills Wine Tours requires a credit card and a $100 deposit at the time of booking for all wine tours. If a booking is made within 7 days of the tour date, the $100 deposit is automatically non-refundable.
